titleStmt.title: Description of Torah ʿim perush Rash"i ṿe-Minḥat Yehudah(תורה עם פרוש רש"י ומנחת יהודה)

notesStmt.note: Folio 1r contains doodles, in Hebrew and Italian.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Pentateuch with Rashi's commentary, accompanied by parts of Minḥat Yehuda.

msItem.title: Torah ʿim perush Rash"i ṿe-Minḥat Yehudah תורה עם פרוש רש"י ומנחת יהודה

collation.p:
24 quires of 8 leaves each.
Quires marked with catchwords at the end, only partly preserved.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive script, not punctuated, of 14th century.

binding.p: Post-1600. Brown leather. Spine: 'Commentaria In Pentateuchum. Hebraice. Mus. Brit. Jure Emptionis. 11,566. Plut. CCXLIXIIG.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Thomas Rodd the younger (b. 1796, d. 1849), London bookseller: bought by the British Museum from Rodd on 13 April 1839, folio 1r.
